translations: v．服从，遵守：按照规定、命令或要求行事。

sentences.sentence: When your dog obeys a simple request of "come here, sit", it is showing obedience and respect for you.
sentences.translation: 你的狗服从一个简单的“过来，坐下”的指令，这是它对你表示服从和尊重。

sentences.sentence: He thinks the rules his mother has made are good for him, so he faithfully obeys them.
sentences.translation: 他认为他母亲制定的规则对他有益，所以他忠实地遵守这些规则。

sentences.sentence: I found it's much better to praise him when he obeys and not to be so fussy when he makes mistakes.
sentences.translation: 我发现当他听话时表扬他，而当他犯错误时不要也太挑剔，这样会好得多。
